website_summaries.verdict: A well-built, tidy scooter from a popular U.K. company. Well-worth the investment for all it has to offer.
pros: Sporty looking and speedy to drive
Sturdy four-wheeled design includes a spacious locking trunk
Assembled in Great Britain by a trusted U.K. brand
cons: Occasional issues with the handbrake have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter and great company,
customer_reviews.text: Scooter arrived today. Alex was great showing me how things worked and he brought scooter into my garden for me. The bike is wonderful, thus far I can’t fault it.. looks and feels very strong.. it’s faster than my last scooter.. The people I was dealing with seem a very honest company who went out of their way to help with my concerns. I would recommend this scooter and company without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Fast scooter
customer_reviews.text: The scooter is fast as it was advertised! However, the parking brake is a little bit hard to operate for an older person, the initial moving off can be difficult if you are on an incline, more often the machine will jump (Refinement on the stat would be an advantage and perhaps the rear brake could be fitted to use the foot.) I find that there is a lot to do for the hand specially the left one baring in mind that the driver usually a disabled person.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M Tanczos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 10 days early so wasn't prepared to take delivery. Found small dent in the back after delivery man left. Queried whether it should have had a seat belt, had two replies, one saying it shouldn't and one saying that no vehicle leaves them without seat belts. It is not possible to change KPH to MPH which is annoying. Haven't been able to use it as I can't engage the hand brake - it's too stiff. No proper manual, just a load of photocopied sheets which have no numbers and are impossible to put in sequence. On reflection I wish I had been able to see the scooter before purchasing but, being housebound, this wasn't possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice scooter well made and its fast dosent take long to get around i would recomend to get one
customer_reviews.text: nice scooter fast and cant fault it the only thing i had a problem with was the delivery but every think else about the scooter is pretty fast 15 miles an hour and gose 35 miles on a full charge i would recomend to any one if thay are used to grip control but its very fast for a scooter its well made and has sharp breaks and has a hand break incase you go dien steep hills
customer_reviews.author: marguerite whitem

customer_reviews.title: Independence
customer_reviews.text: There was a delay in delivery, twice put back. But this was all forgiven due to the friendly ,helpful and efficiency of the delivery man, alas whose name I failed to get. Plus the machine itself- superb. With a short practice run I now have my independence back- cannot keep off it If you need a mobility scooter try to get one of these. Ron Dunn
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The big Red
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the scooter is top of the range shape style its a little different to most others iv seen will serenely stand out
customer_reviews.author: Freda jauncey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious mobility scooter with gears, brakes, suspension, indicators and lights. It is a heavy machine, so not all portable, unless you have a trailer. If you drive a car, you can handle this, but otherwise I would choose one that is less complex, maybe a class 1. I think it’s wonderful. It can go up to 30 miles per charge, and is great on kerbs and dropped pavements. Thoroughly recommended with the provisos above.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Moran

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The back wheels scaling ,mirrors are not starting still, when they tighten up they’re the wrong way round! I would not recommend this prouduct as I’m having to send my product back as the bloke also spoke very rudely!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to recommend this scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Scooter arrived very quckly to north of Scotland. Deliveryman helpful and pleasant, explained how it worked. I am very happy with the scooter. It is comfortable, looks smart and performs very well. Excellent lighting. Storage over the 2 lockers is reasonable, although not quite enough for a week's shopping. There is a steering lock for security. I added a motion sensor (from Amazon, £12 very reasonable and effective.) Couple of minor queries answered promptly. Overall very satisfied and happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous mobility,great colour,very nice to drive up till now total lockdown
customer_reviews.author: G,

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and modern design easy to use and very fast compared to other road scooters delivered with instruction and demonstration a very helpful polite service from the delivery guy and good communication from the sales team
customer_reviews.author: davie

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: could do with better brakes and a better turning angle
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Tulloch

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking , very large turning circle, flimsy pin for locking break
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking bike , lots of style. Turning circle very big and pin to hold break is very thin seems wrong and imagine the first thing to break. This needs to be redesigned with a more robust means to lock break ie sturdy clip button?
customer_reviews.author: geraldine

customer_reviews.title: More like a moped to use. Very good looking scotter.
customer_reviews.text: Goes much faster than 16 mph does 25mph, not like a mobility scooter to use its more like a moped so takes a bit off getting used too. Plenty off storage under the seat & a lockable boot behind the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: all you need for a mobility scooter
customer_reviews.text: i liked everything about it could spend all day riding around on it very impressive and a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husbands mobility scooter
customer_reviews.text: The man who delivered. My husband scooter was very help full and kind
customer_reviews.author: kathleen sharp

customer_reviews.title: No good for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Scooter very badly let down by it’s turning wheel lock such a shame good looking scooter
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: New Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product Jack took me through every stage and was extremely professional .
customer_reviews.author: Gary Woods

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Great mobility. Having suffered an arthritic knee it is now a pleasure to shop. Storage is good on the scooter. Every trip is a new adventure.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with product - logistics needs work
customer_reviews.text: Readers I initially purchased (and reviewed) this machine after I had trouble with logistics and deliveries. To be clear, the machine is amazing but it was the logistics that caused me concern and initial stress. The product didnt arrive when promised nor did I get the ‘training’ the was promised on delivery. I can tell you that the owner of the business has gone above and beyond my expectations to correct them personally and, went on to explain why he had issues and what he has done to solve them for all. I appreciated that. The delight of having the machine and some personal service makes the initial pain of delivery and training go away. Highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: DaveSh

customer_reviews.title: Best scooter out there.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine.. so glad i got a better model then the lical mobility shops wanted for x3 the money it cost. Real bargain. Thank you veleco and extremebulbs. Update. This scooter is extremely fast, the full allround suspension and large wheels make its handling a dream. The turning circle is ok for such a large and powerful machine, but not the best. Storage is great, better than other scooters out there, with the back box and under seat storage. It has a usb charging point for your phone/ipod too. The lights (high/low beam), indicators and break lights are excellent, very bright. Fantastic machine and half the price that a mobility shop would charge you.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter, wish I had gone to velobike to buy
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter, delivery driver, Jack, was brilliant, explained averything and answered 2 texts next day very quickly for me. Amazon supplier kept making delivery promises then breaking them. Velobike deliver in 2 weeks, it took over 3 weeks to get this
customer_reviews.author: sbjinx

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service, totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: Can't recommend enough, from the very first ime I made contact with a query I have been impressed. The scooter itself is brilliant, it handles paths that need a little bit of tlc with ease and is very very easy to use. It has my Dad out and about again and loving every minute of it. We live in Ireland and delivery was seamless and the whole process from ordering to receiving was much quicker than I expected it to be. Ten out of ten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Distance only 15 km
customer_reviews.text: This scooter only goes 15km not 45-50 km as it says on amazon website, I have contacted amazon and seller they don’t take any action to help me increase my riding distance, instead discriminates me by my weight and I drive fast , so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Deniz Onder

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The scooter is amazing looks great and easy to use very comfortable. The delivery guy explained everything to me in detail and went with me on a trail run. I would recommend this scooter and company you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: carol brown

customer_reviews.title: All round great experience
customer_reviews.text: Really nice scooter amazing quality well worth the money. The delivery driver was also lovely kept me informed of times of delivery ect...polite and helpful at all times Really pleasant service all round
customer_reviews.author: ellen griffiths

customer_reviews.title: No aftercare at all
customer_reviews.text: Aftercare is non existent. I was delivered a scooter with many faults. Yet I was made to feel like it was all my own fault. The scooter is fantastic in itself, the company is not!!
customer_reviews.author: 🌹 LonDonDonz  🌹

customer_reviews.title: check all works before you sign
customer_reviews.text: Received 4 June 2020. indicators weren't working properly need connection doing.theres no auto brake....have to brake by steering. The handbrake is hard to get use to but all in all its a brilliant scooter
customer_reviews.author: Peter lonergan
